description: Salicylic acid-based facial cleanser that helps treat and prevent acne without over-drying the skin.

product: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser
description: A cream-based gentle cleanser suitable for normal to dry skin. Formulated with niacinamide and prebiotic thermal water.
